title: Why am I seeing a message that there is a problem with my payment?
content:
If you see a message that there is a problem with your payment, it means Grammarly was unable to process it because your credit card issuer or financial institution rejected the transaction.
To resolve this, we suggest you update your payment method by following the steps from this article:
How do I update my billing details?
If thereâ€™s still a problem with your payment after updating your payment method, please reach out to your credit card issuer or financial institution for further assistance.
